name: piano-teacher
description: An interactive way to learn piano using a visual piano interface.
author: Callum O'Prey callumoprey@gmail.com

scripts.build:samsung: powershell -Command 'Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force build; Copy-Item index.html build/; Copy-Item styles.css build/; Copy-Item -Recurse sounds build/; Copy-Item -Recurse build_icons build/; npx cap sync'
